title: Implement misspelling.ts - Top 100 common misspellings
description: Port from proselint/checks/spelling/misspelling.py. Top common misspellings with corrections. Est: 2 hours

title: Implement phrasalAdjectives.ts - Hyphenation rules
description: Port from proselint/checks/misc/phrasal_adjectives.py. Compound modifier hyphenation (well-known). Est: 1.5 hours

title: Implement dashes.ts - Em dash, en dash, hyphen usage

comments.author: samdwyer
comments.text: Completed dashes.ts with 2 check functions: checkMultipleHyphens and checkRangeDash. Handles em dashes (---, --) and en dashes for ranges.

title: Implement creditCards.ts - Credit card number detection
description: Port from proselint/checks/restricted/credit_card.py. Detect credit card patterns and warn about PCI compliance. Est: 1.5 hours

title: Create GitHub Release v0.9.0 - Personal use
description: Tag v0.9.0. Create GitHub release with built assets (main.js, manifest.json, styles.css). Add release notes. Est: 30 min

title: Implement metadiscourse.ts - Self-referential writing
description: Port from proselint/checks/misc/metadiscourse.py. 'As mentioned before' type phrases. Est: 1.5 hours

title: Implement illogic.ts - Illogical constructions
description: Port from proselint/checks/misc/illogic.py. Logical inconsistencies and contradictions. Est: 1.5 hours

title: Create CHANGELOG.md - v0.9.0 release notes
description: Document all features, known limitations. Est: 30 min

title: Week 2 Integration - Register misc category checks
description: Create phase5aMisc.ts registration file. Update main.ts and settings UI. Test all Week 2 checks. Est: 2 hours

title: Implement passwords.ts - Password detection
description: Port from proselint/checks/restricted/passwords.py. Detect obvious passwords in text. Est: 1.5 hours

title: Implement lgbtq.ts - LGBTQ+ sensitivity
description: Port from proselint/checks/social_awareness/lgbtq.py. Outdated/offensive terms with respectful alternatives. Est: 2 hours

title: Update README.md - Document all 26 checks
description: List all implemented checks by category. Update features section. Add usage examples. Est: 1 hour

title: Personal Installation Test - Test in your vault
description: Install in your personal vault. Test with real documents. Verify all checks work. Test settings. Est: 2 hours

title: Implement erOr.ts - er/or confusion
description: Port from proselint/checks/spelling/er_or.py. Words ending in -er vs -or. Est: 1 hour

title: Implement preferredForms.ts - Preferred word forms
description: Port from proselint/checks/misc/preferred_forms.py. Standard vs non-standard forms (e.g., etc.). Est: 2 hours

title: Implement ableIble.ts - able/ible confusion
description: Port from proselint/checks/spelling/able_ible.py. Words ending in -able vs -ible. Est: 1 hour

title: Performance Optimization - Ensure <500ms for 5k words
description: Profile and optimize linting speed. Test with 1k, 5k, 10k word documents. Est: 2 hours

title: Implement apologizing.ts - Unnecessary apologizing
description: Port from proselint/checks/misc/apologizing.py. Phrases like 'I'm sorry to say'. Est: 1 hour

title: Week 3 Integration - Register security & social awareness checks
description: Create phase5aRestricted.ts and phase5aSocialAwareness.ts. Update main.ts and settings. Est: 2 hours

title: Update manifest.json - Version 0.9.0
description: Bump version to 0.9.0. Verify metadata. Est: 15 min

title: Production Build - Create release package
description: Run npm run build. Test built version works correctly. Verify no console errors. Est: 1 hour

title: Implement symbols.ts - Copyright, trademark, registered symbols
description: Port from proselint/checks/typography/symbols.py. Check for proper ©, ®, ™ usage. Est: 1.5 hours

title: Implement raceEthnicity.ts - Race/ethnicity sensitivity
description: Port from proselint/checks/social_awareness/race_ethnicity.py. Outdated/offensive terms with respectful alternatives. Est: 2 hours

title: Implement ellipsis.ts - Ellipsis formatting
description: Port from proselint/checks/typography/ellipsis.py. Check for proper ellipsis character (…) vs three dots. Est: 1 hour

title: Week 1 Integration - Register typography & spelling checks
description: Create phase5aTypography.ts and phase5aSpelling.ts registration files. Update main.ts. Test all 10 new checks together. Est: 3 hours

title: Implement capitalization.ts - Capitalization errors
description: Port from proselint/checks/misc/capitalization.py. Proper nouns, sentence starts, title case. Est: 2 hours

title: Phase 1 Final Testing - All 26 checks
description: Comprehensive testing of all 26 checks (6 existing + 20 new). Performance benchmarking. Integration testing. Est: 3 hours

title: Implement scareQuotes.ts - Unnecessary quotation marks
description: Port from proselint/checks/misc/scare_quotes.py. Inappropriate quote usage. Est: 1 hour

title: Implement pretension.ts - Pretentious language
description: Port from proselint/checks/misc/pretension.py. Overly formal language with simpler alternatives. Est: 2 hours

title: Implement typos.ts - Common typing errors
description: Port from proselint/checks/spelling/typos.py. Keyboard proximity typos and transpositions. Est: 1.5 hours

title: Implement genderBias.ts - Gender-inclusive language
description: Port from proselint/checks/social_awareness/gender_bias.py. Gender-biased language with neutral alternatives. Est: 2 hours
